purpose: To simplify the process of building data APIs for AI agents and data applications using SQL databases
principle: Leverages TypeScript to define and manage SQL-based data APIs, supporting various databases and providing a structured API framework
reusability: Offers a modular architecture with plugins for different databases, supports RESTful API generation, and allows customization through TypeScript
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may imply limited features and potential instability; primarily focused on SQL databases
name: vulcan-sql
description: Data API Framework for AI Agents and Data Apps
highlight: Framework for creating data APIs from SQL databases with TypeScript
